results.title: Statins downregulate K6a promoter activity: a possible therapeutic avenue for pachyonychia congenita.
results.text_hl: One means of treating @<m>DISEASE_Pachyonychia_Congenita</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053549 @@@PC@@@ is identification of small-molecule inhibitors of @<m>DISEASE_Pachyonychia_Congenita</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053549 @@@PC@@@-related keratins.
